articles.title: Khan resigns as Pakistan chief executive
articles.description: Wasim Khan resigns as chief executive of the Pakistan Cricket Board after just over two years in the role.
articles.content:
Wasim Khan joined the Pakistan Cricket Board in February 2019
Wasim Khan has resigned as chief executive of the Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) after just over two years in the role.

articles.title: Test cricket is 'really long' - Moeen
articles.description: England all-rounder Moeen Ali says he chose to retire from Test cricket because he found the format "really difficult to get into" and "really long".
articles.content:
England all-rounder Moeen Ali says he ended his Test career because he found the format "really difficult to get into" and "really long". 
The 34-year-old retired on Monday, but will still play whit… [+4583 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
